headline: Felix Launches Industry's First SoftPOS Solution on Windows with NFM and HP
summary: Felix Payment Systems Ltd. (Felix), a leading provider of cloud-based payment technologies, proudly announces the industry's first deployment of a Windows SoftPOS solution with NFM (Nebraska Furniture Mart) in collaboration with HP, Inc. This deployment highlights a growing trend toward SoftPOS solutions, as retailers increasingly seek to create new customer experiences and freedom from legacy systems.
